segments.text: Hi , I ’ m the superintendent of this building . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I ’ m Paul . Could you show me the apartment on the first floor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like this one . How much is the rent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s on the other side of this floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s your rule about pets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We allow one or two pets but you have to pay a $ 300 deposit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If your pet ruins the apartment walls or carpet we ’ ll keep your pet deposit . If not , we ’ ll return your deposit when you move out . But be careful , we don ’ t allow pet snakes in the apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: who takes care of bug control ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do . We will spray the apartments before you move in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much for taking your time . I ’ m still deciding . I will call you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
